events.message: We received Jane Doe's application for the Software Engineer position today. Her resume highlights strong experience in full-stack development and relevant skills in cloud technologies.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on the candidate's background in software development and engineering projects mentioned in her CV.
Recruiter Alex Smith has been assigned to manage Jane Doe's recruitment process for the Software Engineer role starting today.
Initial screening call with Jane was successful; she demonstrated solid understanding of backend systems and seemed very motivated to join our engineering team.
Jane promptly replied to our screening feedback and confirmed her availability for a technical interview next week, expressing enthusiasm about the role.
Technical interview with Jane has been scheduled for May 20th at 3 PM UTC to assess her coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
Jane successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding proficiency and good problem-solving strategies during the session.
HR interview has been scheduled for Jane on May 25th to discuss cultural fit and compensation expectations.
The HR interview with Jane went well. She showed alignment with company values and clear expectations about her potential role.
An official offer was proposed to Jane Doe for the Software Engineer position including salary, benefits, and start date.
Jane has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed her eagerness to join the team, requesting next steps.
Jane officially accepted the offer today. The recruitment process is moving forward smoothly towards onboarding.
Jane has started the onboarding process, completing all initial documentation and attending the introductory sessions for new engineering hires.
The hiring process for Jane Doe is now officially closed as she has fully integrated into the engineering team and started contributing to projects.
